column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2022-02-20 14:43:49+00:00; ;1495408858621267978;en;68;0;0;18;Twitter for iPhone;"We can and should discuss mental illness & physical illness TOGETHER as parts of a WHOLE rather than “against” each other.

column1: But that involves recognizing & caring for the ways in which physically disabled people are impacted by mental illness. You can’t just separate us."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: or that our minds don’t matter.

column1: As if mental health isn’t impacted by knowing that you’d be left to die in a burning building & everyone’s fine with it…?"

column4: he is at least being monitored very closely (thank god he got that MRI) and has been changed to a better medication to help with pain and mobility.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: or waiting and keeping him EXTREMELY closely monitored while some of the more minor injuries heal so that his surgery can be minimally invasive/easier to recover from)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: and I don’t think I can handle horror stories in my replies right now. And I feel like any decision I make can be the wrong one
column5: as they both have risks and benefits.

column4: but she thinks that some of the others may not be surgical. We’re being asked to make this call.

column1: But I simply should not have to fight to begin with.

column1: We are literally people. With access needs. Just like every other student.

column1: What brings *me* joy is not having to pick between getting my education

column1: Find a way to talk about this without throwing remote access under the bus. https://t.co/X2oVSe4rLI"

I’m not even asking for an improvement. I’m asking them to do the bare minimum and not cut me out of the class entirely.

column1: By eliminating the presence of those harmed by these conditions
column2: they get to pretend that it isn’t happening. That they aren’t doing this to us.

column1: You can speak this reality into existence. You can challenge bullshit excuses."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: I urge you to speak up.

column1: Because by removing us from the space
column2: they also remove us from each other. You will never hear about how inequitable things are because *we are literally prohibited from participating*.

column1: This is exclusion by design."

column5: I’m not actually being given access.

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-13 18:31:21+00:00; ;1459589719726166017;en;70;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;These impressions lead to the quality of my work being diminished and my efforts being erased
column4: as my peers are viewed as independent agents completing their hard work on their own
column5: and I’m not.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: They just see a disabled person getting help that non-disabled students aren’t."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: there is not only a decrease in quality of education

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-13 18:31:20+00:00; ;1459589715015909381;en;60;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"You can’t exclude a whole population of people and then deal with the consequences of that exclusion by literally making a dedicated side-line that systemically streamlines us AWAY from mainstream student affairs
column4: discourse
column5: and learning.

column1: How do you NOT get that?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-13 18:31:20+00:00; ;1459589714093264902;en;69;0;1;7;Twitter for iPhone;"Access centres are a symptom of structural inequity.  They serve to separate issues of inequity in access from issues of teaching and learning
column4: in order to make it acceptable to *not* include us—because “it’s
column5: ok the access centre will handle it”.

column1: This isn’t inclusion."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-13 18:31:20+00:00; ;1459589713170419714;en;74;0;1;9;Twitter for iPhone;"You cannot separate access from learning—we ALL have access needs. Good teaching is accessible.

column1: Teachers should be supported AND ENCOURAGED to build access STRAIGHT INTO their classes
column2: rather than simply passing it off to the access centre."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: and is *applauded* for it.

column1: I need you to understand what it truly means when you celebrate “returning to normal”.
THIS is “normal”."

column4: even if there weren’t a pandemic.

column1: This is not access. It’s literally torture."

column4: students wouldn’t be expected to choose between either climbing up the sides of the building & entering through the window

column1: So why is it acceptable to give US such an ultimatum? Are we not “students” too?"

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 01:12:33+00:00; ;1457878742949314563;en;9;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ArsonSketcher @WalkingAwayTall @ventihibiscus LMFAO

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 01:06:59+00:00; ;1457877342571876353;en;35;0;0;1;Twitter for iPhone;"One of the shitty things about this is that it seems like no matter what
column4: there will always be someone who takes something to the total extreme.

column1: So I worry that *any of this* is taken out of context to justify shitty behaviour."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 01:06:58+00:00; ;1457877340906795009;en;36;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"That doesn’t mean that all attempts at holding members of marginalized communities accountable are oppressive.

column1: But they certainly can be. And we can’t act like they aren’t."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 00:56:41+00:00; ;1457874751108620289;en;36;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;When addressing harm that came from a member (or even multiple members) of an already marginalized
column4: already vilified group of people—you *remain responsible for considering the ways in which your arguments draw power from the systems of oppression that are oppressing them*.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 00:56:40+00:00; ;1457874749531492353;en;46;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;Oppression doesn’t justify inflicting harm on others. But being harmed
column4: too
column5: does not justify ignoring systems of oppression or how we interact with them.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-09 00:05:29+00:00; ;1457861866223542284;en;88;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;"Harm is also not always related to ones own power or privilege.

column1: You can personally inflict harm on someone who has power over you. That doesn’t mean that you now have systemic power over them
column2: or that you’ve managed to oppress them. It simply means you’ve inflicted harm on them."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-08 23:27:01+00:00; ;1457852185912479745;en;145;0;2;16;Twitter for iPhone;"Harm is not synonymous with malice.

column1: Wonderful people with the best intentions can still do things that cause harm.
Accountability is not about punishing people. It’s simply about addressing harm when it happens."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-08 23:27:00+00:00; ;1457852184318652419;en;383;4;2;53;Twitter for iPhone;"Hey I don’t really have the mental stamina to get into this at length right now
column4: but I just wanted to gently remind folk that accountability isn’t about being punished
column5: condemned
column6: attacked

column1: It’s simply about addressing harm."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:36+00:00; ;1457148446348087299;en;287;0;0;25;Twitter for iPhone;I need you to understand that when transphobes talk about raping and forcibly impregnating us like breeding stock—they are not offering to spare our lives.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:36+00:00; ;1457148445437972486;en;238;0;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;"Our ongoing erasure upholds these violent conditions and protects those who participate in  said violence.

column1: The fact that so many people don’t even seem to see the problem *is part of the problem*."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:36+00:00; ;1457148444498350086;en;249;0;1;21;Twitter for iPhone;"I’d like you to consider for a moment that we don’t yet have a word to describe that experience.

column1: So please explain it to me—How safe do you think we are from a form of violence that can’t even be named or specifically identified?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:36+00:00; ;1457148443558924293;en;313;1;1;35;Twitter for iPhone;"If you understand that cis women die during child birth / pregnancy due to systemic violence & neglect
column4: then you understand that systemic neglect functions as a form of violence
column5: right?

column1: Now I want you to explain to me how it is you think trans men are magically surviving."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:35+00:00; ;1457148442468306950;en;258;1;1;19;Twitter for iPhone;"Not all violence looks exactly the same.

column1: “Erasure” functions as a tool in our elimination.
You cannot protect
column3: or even miss something that doesn’t exist. So we’re wiped out silently."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-07 00:50:35+00:00; ;1457148441272913924;en;260;0;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;"Do you think that we all just ~flew under the radar~ with all of the no hormones that doctors gave us back when we had literally no medical agency…?

column1: Or can we maybe admit that *there’s a reason for our scarcity*
column2: and maybe we weren’t all just conveniently hidden."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Or are you simply under the impression that trans men were “applauded for performing masculinity”—as if somehow we were spared the violence of legally belonging to cis men"

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 15:23:55+00:00; ;1456643446148681735;en;310;0;0;22;Twitter for iPhone;"We aren’t women.

column1: When you force us to solely exist as part of that whole
Why does that matter? I’m a trans man. Advocating for reproductive Justice for Cis women
column3: does nothing to guarantee my safety
column4: despite our shared organs."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 15:21:51+00:00; ;1456642925530583041;en;299;2;3;23;Twitter for iPhone;"Also—to elaborate on “it sounds an awful lot like you’re calling us all women”:

column1: I don’t mean like “because misogyny is for GIRLS”—I mean that by lumping us in with cis women
column3: space
column4: & resources allocated to them surely must also fit us.

column1: When they do not."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: The motive or function of “erasing” us is ultimately elimination. As you can’t preserve something that doesn’t exist."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:51:29+00:00; ;1456635284548988931;en;42;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@SaraBruni_79 I don’t entirely understand how the screenshot relates

column1: Thank you"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:50:31+00:00; ;1456635039970643971;en;274;0;3;8;Twitter for iPhone;"There is a way to talk about this without it being about taking over the conversation.

column1: At no point have I expressed that I’m under the impression that we have it worse. We don’t.
That doesn’t mean that we should reduce it altogether."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:46:27+00:00; ;1456634017793691649;en;300;0;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;This violence is an insidious threat to our existence as *trans* people. It’s not just about objectifying or infantilizing us—it’s about eliminating us altogether.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:33:35+00:00; ;1456630781837783040;en;376;0;1;23;Twitter for iPhone;"When trans men are targeted by this violence
column4: even if it seems “the same” to you on the outside—there is a very real *ELIMINATORY* aspect to it.

column1: It is about *getting rid of trans people*.
I don’t know how to make that clearer."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:33:35+00:00; ;1456630780722098178;en;448;0;1;36;Twitter for iPhone;There is a very real part of that violence that is rooted in *eradicating* us. Misogyny toward cis women isn’t about eliminating women
column4: it’s about owning and dominating them. That doesn’t make it better
column5: I’m saying that it’s DIFFERENT. And it is important to NOTE that difference.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 14:33:35+00:00; ;1456630779270811653;en;1200;7;7;197;Twitter for iPhone;"I haven’t quite found the words yet
column4: but—When we ignore the *trans* part of the misogynistic violence trans men face as if it’s simply identical to what cis women face…

column1: Not only does it feel an awful lot like you’re just calling us women (👀) but you’re also missing the point."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 13:20:22+00:00; ;1456612355459141635;en;53;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"@JuliaFtacek Nobody said trans men had it worse.

column1: That doesn’t mean that explicitly talking about raping and breeding us like animals isn’t violent.
I’m trying to understand why on earth this minimization of the violence we face was necessary when no one was saying that we have it worse."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: btw lmao sorry if that isn’t clear. These tweets are my opinion on the OP thread
column5: I’m just putting them here to express my agreement with the way you’re feeling on this)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-05 13:10:06+00:00; ;1456609770287288320;en;46;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@storiedcassette No one said “trans men have it worse”
column4: we’re just asking to not be told that nothing is about us even when it very blatantly is.

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:43:23+00:00; ;1451197427889807378;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AmandaMorin This is a great piece

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:21:16+00:00; ;1451191861389905924;en;56;0;0;6;Twitter for iPhone;"Being an ally asks you to challenge the undisrupted norm that we’re suffocating under
column4: even when it’s welcoming or otherwise inviting to you.

column1: It’s no fun. There’s not much glory. But that’s what it is."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:16:43+00:00; ;1451190716898496513;en;63;0;1;5;Twitter for iPhone;Passiveness is participation when you are living in a world that has been BUILT to keep of us out of it. We are expected to die
column4: not live and participate. So our absence is normalized.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:16:42+00:00; ;1451190714541350925;en;54;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;Simply leaving us behind and saying “I’ll do something once they get here
column4: to my side/in my space” is like schools saying that they don’t need to be wheelchair accessible if they don’t have any students in wheelchairs.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:16:42+00:00; ;1451190712968437774;en;60;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;Being an ally involves discomfort. It involves reaching across barriers that you were never meant to encounter
column4: in order to make bridges for those who were.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 14:03:55+00:00; ;1451187498021883912;en;108;1;1;16;Twitter for iPhone;"Here’s the thing about ableism—sometimes
column4: participating in it is actually the easier thing to do.

column1: In fact
Being an ally is hard. It requires that you challenge frictionless experiences."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: you push those of us who can’t further into the margins of society.

column1: But acknowledging that would cause cognitive dissonance. Because you’re Good People who Aren’t Ableist
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 13:56:34+00:00; ;1451185645028732956;en;69;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"I’ve been dropped like I’m scalding garbage by those who pretend the pandemic is over
column4: as if I simply don’t exist because I don’t fit into their lifestyles.

column1: My existence contradicts the reality they’re trying to create."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-21 13:49:10+00:00; ;1451183782535438349;en;78;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;"You all understand that this thing will continue to circulate
column4: but you don’t give a fuck so long as your life is not the one on the line

column1: What the ever-loving fuck is wrong with everyone? And what will it take to make you care?"

column1: I don’t understand"

column1: Still upset that I can’t be there with him because pandemic
But people can go to restaurants and bars.
It’s like we live in different worlds."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 22:33:54+00:00; ;1450228673857085443;en;50;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"When I remember that it was my old family doctor
column4: the one who said my joints dislocated because I was too negative
column5: who denied checking my sad for nearly a decade while this thing grew in him

column1: When I remember his useless and pathetic excuses
The fact that there are 0 consequences"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 22:30:41+00:00; ;1450227866260606976;en;145;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Having a sick parent is weird bc it’s like
column4: you’ll feel ok for a minute but then something reminds you of how profoundly sad you are and suddenly it’s like you’ve been punched in the gut and the whole room is spinning.

column1: I wonder if I’ll ever stop feeling sick thinking about this"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:45:30+00:00; ;1450201395152531463;en;107;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"If you never actually give US space and power—and that means all of us
column4: allowing us to participate even if we aren’t your ideal poster child—then things will not actually change.

column1: And it’s very obvious that you’re aware of that. This is deliberate."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:41+00:00; ;1450200687023902722;en;109;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;This is an attempt at avoiding change—not actually making any meaningful or impactful progress.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:41+00:00; ;1450200685715279881;en;129;0;1;9;Twitter for iPhone;This is worse because not only are we still being ignored
column4: but we’re being gaslit about it. As you created this group to give the IMPRESSION of progress. To shut down and deflect criticism
column5: and avoid accountability for the inequitable realities within the school.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:41+00:00; ;1450200684528295947;en;149;0;1;7;Twitter for iPhone;"You can’t just stack 10 admins in a trench coat and act like that’s anything other than exactly what it is.

column1: You have not actually disrupted anything. You are guarding power and extinguishing our voices underneath your own."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:40+00:00; ;1450200682338918406;en;156;0;2;7;Twitter for iPhone;This “advisory committee” is just the university representing and electing itself
column4: but changing the name to make it sound like they are NOT totally dominating and excluding us from conversations that involve us.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:40+00:00; ;1450200680489177090;en;194;0;1;8;Twitter for iPhone;"Not only can we not participate even if we want to
column4: we don’t even get a say in electing those who ARE supposedly advocating for access by participating in this group.

column1: How on earth can you call that progressive or inclusive? As if we need or want you to speak FOR us?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 20:42:39+00:00; ;1450200677699969025;en;595;2;6;107;Twitter for iPhone;I’m not going go get over my university putting together an “Accessibility Advisory Committee” just to create the impression of consulting with disabled students on matters of access
column4: when in fact disabled students cannot sign up to participate. It’s entirely an internal thing.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:45:54+00:00; ;1450125998905769988;en;188;0;4;22;Twitter for iPhone;"Anyway I’ll stop ranting now—I just have a lot of thoughts about this.

column1: To say that ableism is hiding in plain sight would be an understatement.
Ableism is wearing neon colours
column3: and spitting fire. Yet we are gaslit for even daring to perceive it."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:45:54+00:00; ;1450125997664358401;en;179;0;2;17;Twitter for iPhone;"When equity is exceptionalized
column4: inclusion becomes “special treatment”.

column1: It is not “normal” to include us
column2: and so to request to be included is to request something above and beyond—something beyond what is necessary. Our needs are not necessities
column3: they’re treats. Rewards. Favors."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:45:53+00:00; ;1450125995298656258;en;164;1;1;14;Twitter for iPhone;"In a world where our exclusion is “normal”
column4: ableism is no longer even framed as what it is.

column1: “It’s not ableist—it’s just the way things are”.
But when we attempt to neutralize the charged and oppressive realities of the norm
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:36:55+00:00; ;1450123735130857472;en;166;2;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;It’s just everywhere. We breathe it like air. It assumes this false neutrality
column4: where it’s rarely even perceived by those perpetuating in it.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:36:54+00:00; ;1450123733566382091;en;182;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I feel bad because it’s like… I know it’s not like it’s this assignments fault that I can’t go with my dad & the pandemic goes on & our lives aren’t considered full lives. It’s a little misplaced.

column1: But in a broad way
Because it all comes down to ableism"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 14:56:44+00:00; ;1450113624916336645;en;175;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;This is fine and I’m definitely not A Little Bitter All The Time™

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: in and of themselves

I really

column4: & hardly anyone sees that as an issue."

column4: which streets are safe to roll on when the sidewalks are broken

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: does anyone have any tips or advice for managing the intensity of the metallic taste that accompanies chemo?

column1: My dads tried everything but it’s pretty unrelenting. Even water tastes like metal. I’m wondering if anyone’s found anything helpful to alleviate this a bit?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 16:41:17+00:00; ;1449415157399138309;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@ghhostboyy Once your soy milk is made
column4: use 1 part soy milk and 4 or 5 parts water
column5: and soak your fibres in that for about 8-12 hours
column6: stirring every few hours

column1: Take them out
column2: dab extra soy milk off (they shouldn’t be dripping) and dry flat. Once dry
column3: repeat that two or three more times"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 16:39:44+00:00; ;1449414767416852486;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ghhostboyy Yes! Homemade works best from what I was told
column4: so I made some myself (I soaked the beans overnight in water
column5: blended it all up
column6: then strained it
column7: then reblended the beans in water and strained it again a few times)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Absolutely
Forever. 😂

I need to know"

column4: to change the colours)

column1: But I have 3 more of these that I made so I can test the iron post mordant
column3: and soda ash post mordant"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 14:30:25+00:00; ;1449382225099821056;en;13;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I also tried it on white linen scraps that I found from an old project (as my initial project only tested the yellow linen I received in my kit)

column1: Colours were stronger
column2: but still not as vivid as those from the silks and wools."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 14:30:25+00:00; ;1449382224021921795;en;14;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;I also broadened the type of plant fibres I used. What I mean by that is: I tried cotton linen blends
column4: and I experimented with the weave of the material (so I tried it on a canvas weave
column5: loose weave
column6: and even on a strip of absorbent drop cloth just to see what would happen)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-16 14:30:24+00:00; ;1449382220356018182;en;14;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;What I did here was: I simmered the plant fibres in their own dye bath at higher heat (these fibres can tolerate higher heat than the silk and wool can)
column4: and I also made the mordanting solution a little stronger (using 25% alum instead of 20%
column5: for those that are mordanted) https://t.co/2Cq1k0UL7B

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:57+00:00; ;1446904531569283075;en;35;0;4;1;Twitter for iPhone;It’s these connections that make me feel like maybe there’s a reason why I’m the way that I am
column4: and maybe it’s not a terrible thing.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:56+00:00; ;1446904529908273152;en;30;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Every once in a while though
column4: someone might show up with an intricately shaped cup or glass.

column1: And they might prefer water that hasn’t been frozen and neatly organized into stacks—as it doesn’t necessitate breaking themselves trying to mold their cup around it."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:56+00:00; ;1446904528809480196;en;23;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;Once everything settles
column4: I take my leaky bucket and hold it back up to the crack in my ceiling—waiting for the water to collect once more and praying to god that nobody ever asks me to stack it again.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:56+00:00; ;1446904527463010305;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;There’s a drain in the floor that collects this excess water
column4: and as it works I’m sucked into a whirlpool. This feels like it goes on for days.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:55+00:00; ;1446904525953060866;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;My words
column4: still water
column5: pour from the crack in the ceiling as I try to apologize. The person is now flooded from the room.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:55+00:00; ;1446904523184877575;en;24;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"But I can’t find an ice tray. And the person who was holding the bucket is now soaked. Exhausted
column4: they eventually drop it.

column1: I try to collect what I can from the ground
column2: but it’s impossible to grab with my hands."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:54+00:00; ;1446904521502961667;en;25;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Sometimes
column4: I’ll try passing the bucket to someone
column5: so I can go searching for an ice tray.

column1: You have to start somewhere
column2: right? It’s okay if it’s a bit messy—we’re working out the kinks! This is the first and necessary step to stacking my water so others can hold it :)"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:54+00:00; ;1446904520483774464;en;27;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;No one can hold any one part of the water without holding on to the whole leaky bucket—while in the meantime
column4: the ceiling continues dripping.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:54+00:00; ;1446904518692818955;en;32;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"This is where communicating sometimes feels like I’m being asked to stack water.

column1: Sure
column2: I notice other people doing it. They turn their water into ice & organize it into neat little easily held stacks.

column1: But I hold my water in this leaky bucket beneath a cracked & dripping ceiling"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:53+00:00; ;1446904517375705088;en;35;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"This is why just “picking a starting point” rarely works for me. The problem is that there is no starting point. It’s round. I don’t think in words or lines.

column1: And flattening things beyond recognition just to get them anywhere close to being expressible doesn’t always work out."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:53+00:00; ;1446904516394225666;en;31;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"If I try to explain the background info in order to better situate what I’m saying
column4: I tend to lose people as it gets too convoluted.

column1: But if I DON’T go over all that background info
column2: then what I’m saying just doesn’t communicate what I’m trying to say at all. Not even close."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:53+00:00; ;1446904515060457473;en;44;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;"Often times it’s like
column4: I can hear myself not making any sense and I get frustrated because I just need there to be something rounder.

column1: I need this one sentence to be overlaid with several others that inform it in order to get anywhere close to communicating what I’m trying to."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 18:24:52+00:00; ;1446904513017925639;en;150;1;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"One of my biggest struggles is untangling my thoughts and delivering what is in my brain to the outside world in a manner that is coherent.

column1: It often feels impossible because it’s like…I think in the round but words are so linear."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-07 14:25:57+00:00; ;1446119612983087108;en;56;0;2;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Dammit I wish i didn’t have to scrupulously ration my energy every day. It sucks—it feels like I never have enough time
column4: even though there are huge chunks of time spent just struggling to do more

column1: Like
column2: there IS time. There just isn’t enough me"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Mix together dry ingredients
column2: mix together wet ingredients (mix this well

column4: as it helps me to better balance my blood sugar and better tolerate the treat (sustains energy for longer

column4: mix that in with the dry ingredients.

column1: It takes 12 tablespoons of powdered peanut butter to substitute the half cup of regular peanut butter in this recipe.

824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-10 21:00:38+00:00; ;1436434465371398173;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Wet ingredients:

column1: • 3 ripe bananas (mashed. medium or large bananas work fine)
• 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• 1/2 cup apple sauce (this substitutes oil/butter)
• 1/2 cup peanut butter*
• (optional) 1 egg or egg white
*you can use powdered peanut butter. See next tweet"

column1: • 1 cup sugar (or sweetener of your choice—I use granulated monkfruit as a sugar-free substitute)

column1: • 1/2 teaspoon salt
• 1 teaspoon baking soda"

column4: we don’t have any balconies or access to outdoor space at all in our apartment. No patio door
column5: not even a fire escape. Grow vegetables where
column6: exactly??

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 14:41:27+00:00; ;1434527098933239816;en;68;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;"…you can’t really fit more than a weeks worth of food in there
column4: especially when you’re more than 1 person (we don’t have a fridge/freezer each??)

column1: That isn’t enough space to “stock up”—that’s just regular grocery shopping.
Eating healthy is expensive. Make it more accessible."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 14:41:26+00:00; ;1434527097284972548;en;68;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"The people who act like you can “stock up and freeze” tons of “healthy” food—have you ever tried living that way?

column1: We have a busted fridge and freezer
column2: but I still use it to keep things as cool as possible and let me tell you—when you eat from the freezer all day every day…"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 14:41:26+00:00; ;1434527096139833350;en;105;0;3;13;Twitter for iPhone;"Instead of shaming people in poverty for eating what’s available to them
column4: channel energy into getting your local grocery stores to give away unsold perishable food items that would otherwise me thrown away.

column1: Stop blaming individuals for structurally created & maintained issues."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 14:41:26+00:00; ;1434527094395052042;en;467;1;7;107;Twitter for iPhone;"I don’t think people even take into account that ANY perishable food is innately more expensive/inaccessible
column4: solely because it will perish.

column1: You can’t stock up when it’s a good price
column2: & you can’t freeze it without a functional freezer (freezers are expensive & also very small) https://t.co/sjbptcOSAZ"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 13:59:10+00:00; ;1434516457115820036;en;48;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;It was a very cis-centred way of looking at it
column4: where trans people were out-grouped as this whole other kind of person. There was no acknowledgement for the reality that many trans people once assumed they were cis too…? Anyway lmao

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 13:59:09+00:00; ;1434516455681400837;en;40;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;Anyway this is part of why casual representation is so important. The only exposure I had ever had to transness was like… centred around it. Like
column4: to be trans meant that all day every day all you woke up knowing that you were trans and Suffering™  about it.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-05 13:30:24+00:00; ;1434509221568057346;en;51;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;I grew up without the language to understand or express what I now know is dysphoria. I was 20 when I got my first binder
column4: and I didn’t even know the word “binder” existed. It’s wild how much can change in 7 years 😅

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Looking for more

column4: responsible
column5: or harder working.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-03 11:41:43+00:00; ;1433757090946891776;en;44;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;It’s just not possible for some of our bodies to demand predictability where it doesn’t exist. And conflating what our bodies can/can’t do with our levels of effort or professionalism is
column4: in fact
column5: ableist.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-03 11:41:42+00:00; ;1433757090003275777;en;29;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;I would arrive at my studio classes 2-4 hours early (to secure 1 of the 2 parking spots available to get into the building) and I would still be late for class regularly *because of uncontrolled symptom flareups* (not to mention the obstacle course that is accessing the class)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-03 11:41:42+00:00; ;1433757088996548648;en;31;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s like telling me to just walk better

column1: It’s not an absence of trying
Punctuality requires precision and predictability down to the minute or hour window. That’s not a privilege that I have."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-03 11:41:42+00:00; ;1433757087922806796;en;31;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"When in my life exactly have I been known not to try hard enough? I try my hardest at everything
column4: even if that means running myself into the ground.

column1: That doesn’t mean I can control or postpone my symptoms to a more convenient time that doesn’t overlap with work hours."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-03 11:41:41+00:00; ;1433757086404468766;en;172;0;1;28;Twitter for iPhone;"I have physical symptoms that are uncontrollable
column4: unavoidable
column5: & unpredictable.

column1: There is nothing about me
column3: or the work that I produce that would indicate a lack of motivation / effort.

column1: Yet I’m treated as if lateness = I don’t try hard enough. #MakeAbleismWait https://t.co/gVFaPSw6gQ"

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-08-28 15:35:42+00:00; ;1431641649206149135;en;80;0;0;8;Twitter for iPhone;Keeping us from knowing our “labels” doesn’t actually protect us. It protects ableism.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-08-28 15:35:42+00:00; ;1431641648283340800;en;80;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;And without the words to understand why people may think that of us
column4: we have no reason to believe that they’re wrong in their assumptions. We know that we struggle
column5: we see what they’re referring to
column6: and we assume they must be correct.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-08-28 15:35:41+00:00; ;1431641646454747147;en;233;0;7;53;Twitter for iPhone;"Some do this & claim they didn’t want their child labeling themselves.

column1: But in the absence of labels that help us understand ourselves
column2: we are ascribed other labels—such as “lazy”
column3: “careless”
column4: “unmotivated”

column1: The stigma of disability doesn’t disappear in the absence of its label. https://t.co/bbY36QfHzr"

824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: If you have any advice on how you kept your head out of water
column2: please send that my way. How you kept yourself from falling apart. Or how/when things went well.

column1: But I don’t have it in me to hear about anything else right now."

column1: She wouldn’t even examine me. We sat there as she talked down to me and basically said “call me when you’re ready for a hysto”
column2: and then proceeded to not answer my hysto questions because “that only matters if you have one”"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: we spent 10 minutes quantifying what “counts” as sex and I’m there like “can you just do the fucking test” and she said no lmfao

column1: My mother is in remission for cervical cancer and was first diagnosed in her 20s
My grandmother on my dads side also had cervical cancer
👀. https://t.co/B8hLjlUNHw"

column4: verbatim she said exactly this.

column1: She said that “you can’t have cervical cancer if you don’t have penetrative sex because cervical cancer is caused by HPV
column2: and HPV is transmitted through penetrative sex only”

column1: And I just... I should have recorded. I’m upset that I didn’t https://t.co/OBkZFvfInG"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 18:29:25+00:00; ;1396533743586795530;en;68;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Being related to me doesn’t magically make someone more suited to be my parent
column4: or give them the sole & divine right to being my parent."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 18:29:25+00:00; ;1396533742626279425;en;69;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;Some of us were abandoned voluntarily. We shouldn’t be denied the chance at having parents merely because the ones biologically related to us didn’t want to be them.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 18:29:25+00:00; ;1396533741711994883;en;72;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;Arguing for guardianship over adoption is entirely reductive of what it’s actually like to be in a situation like that. To be cared for but never claimed. Like we’re just strays who need a warm bed
column4: and having a parent is nothing more than that.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 18:29:24+00:00; ;1396533740214669319;en;150;0;3;11;Twitter for iPhone;"Adopting a kid is about committing to being their parents forever—being family for their whole lives
column4: not just until adulthood.

column1: Reducing adoption to ownership implies that parenthood is solely reserved to those blood related to their kids. https://t.co/WRfrLTckHQ"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 17:52:47+00:00; ;1396524523533619201;en;1;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@lilturtlegod Yes
column4: absolutely

column1: I do not disagree with that whatsoever
It just... like
column2: the rest of us who just had shitty home situations are still here too & I very much would have loved to be claimed by someone as family

column1: Calling that “ownership” is just.. sorry I don’t have the words atm"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 17:42:12+00:00; ;1396521861706620931;en;6;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@Subimaginati @lilririah What I’m saying is I came from a family that provided me a home and love
column4: but not family. I wasn’t adopted
column5: I wasn’t and never will be their kid. Now as an adult
column6: their kids are still their kids—and I’m not.

column1: It’s just not the same."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 17:40:28+00:00; ;1396521424345501704;en;6;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@lilririah @peachybruise I just don’t like the leap to “and that’s why adoption is unnecessary” (in a thread you quoted
column4: not in your own actual tweets)

column1: Because there are so many people who do genuinely just want kids
column2: and kids who genuinely want parents & come from families that don’t"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

Thank you for being patient with me ❤️

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Bio parents should not be entitled to parenthood by virtue of blood. Reducing adoption ownership reserves parenthood for bio families
column2: and ignores what it means to be/have parents"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 11:28:48+00:00; ;1396427891513102340;en;7;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@thaoslikespie @lilririah Yeah the system is absolutely garbage. I’m in the same boat in terms of too disabled to adopt/not wealthy enough. I just think that we can eliminate the current system without eliminating the concept of adopting a kid altogether

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 11:18:36+00:00; ;1396425323437301760;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@peachybruise @lilririah (racism
column4: capitalism
column5: ableism)

column1: The concept of adoption itself can exist on its own
column2: without that violence. Recognizing that is important to me
column3: as it recognizes the trauma of NOT having a family that claims you. That being cared for is not the same as having parents & a family."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 11:13:42+00:00; ;1396424090819473409;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@peachybruise @lilririah This is why talking ab it as if it’s a concept to be abolished altogether is not exactly the same as prison and police abolition. Those are concepts that in and of themselves are violent as their sole purpose is violence. Adoption is rendered violent due to surrounding structures

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 11:07:52+00:00; ;1396422624981442563;en;25;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"@peachybruise @lilririah There is never a time where prisons & police are not violent. But adoption isn’t like that.

column1: The violence involved here is due to the adoption industrial complex
column2: rather than the concept of adopting itself (being: extending parenthood beyond biology & blood bonds)."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 11:01:20+00:00; ;1396420978553638915;en;17;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@peachybruise @lilririah That’s where I disagree—I think that adoption as a concept doesn’t have to belong to them.

column1: Guardianship is great when a kid still has bio family that wants them.
But adopting is about committing to being someone’s parent when they don’t
column2: & recognizing that bond as full & real"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: I just have a lot of feelings about it (I don’t feel like I’m doing a great job of articulating because it’s so emotionally loaded
column5: so thank you for bearing with me as i rambled through scrambled thoughts)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:47:38+00:00; ;1396417531578130432;en;23;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@peachybruise @lilririah I get what these arguments are about
column4: but there needs to be a way to go about it that distinguishes adoptive parenting from the adoption industrial complex.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:43:53+00:00; ;1396416588253995008;en;24;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;@peachybruise @lilririah Committing to being parents is important. Especially to kids who were abandoned.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:43:08+00:00; ;1396416400936382467;en;24;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"@peachybruise @lilririah My foster parents love and commitment to me was entirely contingent on my behaviour. They could literally just stop being my family
column4: because they weren’t my parents. Parents can’t stop being parents.

column1: That security and stability is important."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:41:57+00:00; ;1396416103488819200;en;19;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@peachybruise @lilririah Being claimed by a family doesn’t have to be about owning a child. It can be about committing to being someone’s parent
column4: as seriously and legitimately as a bio parent.

column1: Kids with families dont have to worry about possibly no longer being related to their mom if they fuck up."

column4: the “legal guardianship” argument continues to reduce parenthood to ownership—claiming that parenthood isn’t necessary
column5: and all we need is to be raised and cared for like livestock.

column1: It is so reductive of what a family is."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:31:23+00:00; ;1396413444644036612;en;83;0;4;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@lilririah Being a parent should not be reduced to ownership. Parents are parents for life. It’s a lifelong commitment to being there for someone’s whole life.

column1: Acting like that can only be granted to birthing/blood parents because “adoption = ownership” is fucked up. We aren’t cattle."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-23 10:22:34+00:00; ;1396411221801271296;en;96;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"@lilririah I wanted to belong
column4: I wanted to be part of a family
column5: I wanted to have parents. It’s not just about being taken care of. I was a kid
column6: not a pet.

column1: Acting like I could never truly belong in any family other than that of blood & birth origin is messed up. I don’t like this at all."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: and this discourse feels like it’s erasing that and erasing us & any of our desires for the sake of making a stronger argument against adoption altogether."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: I’m an adult now and I’ve rekindled my relationship with my birth parents
column2: but I’m sorry. No. They just didn’t want me and I’d have given anything in the world to be wanted by another parent. Not just cared for like a stray."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: personally.

column1: Also—it can be really expensive to try and replace old dysphoria inducing clothing when coming out/transitioning.
So I just wanted to share this incase this helps anyone out this summer 🤷🏻‍♂️"

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-15 19:24:35+00:00; ;1393648523313299456;en;2209;11;24;447;Twitter for iPhone;"Short trans masc tip:

column1: If you have old “womens” shirts laying around that fit well in length but make you dysphoric bc of the shape/cut—you can use them to make great sleeveless shirts.

column1: So
column3: hopefully this is useful info 😅"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:28:59+00:00; ;1389678462848352256;en;15;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"Anyway—hopefully this helps.

column1: I’ve seen this misconception about POTS and fainting quite a bit
column2: and it’s unfortunate as it can often prevent folk from getting treated or diagnosed"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:24:48+00:00; ;1389677412322000900;en;13;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;That pots wave—the heart racing and suddenly feeling like death—is more in-line with stereotypical POTS than full on fainting is. Fainting is typical of low blood pressure (which
column4: again
column5: CAN happen. But often because of co-occurring conditions more than POTS itself)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:24:48+00:00; ;1389677411298598915;en;13;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Even as the initial surge fades
column4: many symptoms linger (especially weakness
column5: fatigue
column6: headaches

column1: There’s also an overall exhaustion
....which makes sense because your heart was just RACING as if you were working out
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: these symptoms often hit all at once
column5: like a sudden “pots wave”. You stand and it hits you like a brick wall.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:31+00:00; ;1389674823807291393;en;17;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;This can happen when you stand
column4: but also when you bend over to pick something up
column5: when you turn or shake your head
column6: when you sit-up or change position — for a lot of us it’s pretty constant and unpredictable

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:31+00:00; ;1389674822586834950;en;19;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;You can also experience fainting symptoms without losing consciousness. This is what I experience a lot (muffled hearing
column4: ringing in the ears
column5: dizziness
column6: vision going black

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:31+00:00; ;1389674821479452682;en;14;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;You can still faint (especially if you have a co-occurring condition that impacts your ability to absorb nutrients and stuff
column4: as many of us do)
column5: but it’s an exception more than a rule.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:30+00:00; ;1389674820498083851;en;16;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s a big part of what distinguishes it from other conditions that may present with very similar symptoms
column4: but for totally different reasons.

column1: POTS is a form of dysautonomia."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:30+00:00; ;1389674819436883974;en;20;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s actually more in-line to NOT faint.

column1: I’m sharing this bc some doctors will gaslight POTS patients with the whole “well if you don’t faint...” but we’re literally not supposed to faint lmao
That’s... the point
The heart overworks in order to prevent fainting. That’s POTS"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 20:14:29+00:00; ;1389674817033474057;en;57;3;6;14;Twitter for iPhone;"Hey just retweeting with comment to share with anyone else—

column1: I’ve seen some folk confuse POTS with Orthostatic hypotension or low BP in general.
I just wanted to mention that POTS is actually characterized by an *absence* of Orthostatic hypotension & presence of increased HR https://t.co/QHoErvnS6I https://t.co/8IJ1rWToYr"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 19:49:17+00:00; ;1389668473454927873;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@aleth_personal I’d look into a wearable heart rate monitor! Preferably only that tracks constantly (rather than one that only checks every few minutes)

column1: This might provide some insight!"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 19:47:19+00:00; ;1389667976706674690;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@aleth_personal Hope this helps!

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 19:47:13+00:00; ;1389667954476867591;en;12;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@aleth_personal Although fainting can still occur
column4: it’s an exception more than it is a rule.

column1: Some folk may confuse low blood pressure (hypotension) with POTS
column2: which can make it confusing—But they’re different. And the absence of regularly fainting is actually more in line with a POTS diagnosis"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 19:44:28+00:00; ;1389667262517370880;en;20;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@aleth_personal In fact
column4: the absence of Orthostatic hypotension is part of the diagnostic criteria. It’s part of what distinguishes it from other similar conditions. https://t.co/XSpTkuTgCy

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-05-04 19:31:03+00:00; ;1389663884227797000;en;49;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@aleth_personal Hello!

column1: Just wanted to pop in to mention that POTS is characterized more by the increased heart rate (when upright) than it is with fainting.
The heart has to work harder to keep blood circulating up to the brain."

column4: I never really learned to sew. My grandmother
column5: after whom I was named
column6: was a professional seamstress. Having lived in Italy nearly her whole life
column7: she only spoke Italian. Despite sharing a name
column8: we unfortunately did not share much else due to this language barrier.

column1: Please lmfao I’m so tired of having to explain BOTH ends of this."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-04-15 15:17:00+00:00; ;1382714580288299015;en;49;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"The chair exists to make MY life easier.

column1: If you want to jump through hoops to carry your wheelchair halfway up the stairs just so no one sees you standing in a picture
But I refuse to make my actual lived reality in this body worse just for the consumption of others"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: the government doesn’t just drop a wheelchair accessible home on your head after you get diagnosed.

column1: Congrats if you live somewhere accessible. That would obviously be ideal
column2: but ultimately still has more to do with luck than it does my health."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-04-15 15:16:59+00:00; ;1382714575737516032;en;44;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Reducing the severity & validity of my condition down to the number of pics I have in my wheelchair is so entirely ass backwards when you consider the *physical strength* required to even set up and *use* the chair in an inaccessible space."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-04-15 15:16:58+00:00; ;1382714574189826048;en;55;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"This is also your gentle reminder that I’m disabled when I’m standing
column4: too.

column1: I’m getting real tired of the whole “wheelchair out = disability worse”
It sucked enough when abled people did it. It’s particularly heinous when constantly perpetuated by the community itself."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-04-15 14:24:54+00:00; ;1382701470496264195;en;68;0;2;3;Twitter for iPhone;I want to assure you that it is always “that bad”. EDS doesn’t shield me from pain. Every dislocation hurts. Hence why many of us are guarded with our movements. (Or those of us with these symptoms/similar symptoms
column4: at least)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-04-15 14:24:54+00:00; ;1382701469514747906;en;74;0;3;2;Twitter for iPhone;"I think most people would scream if they were in this body for 2 seconds

column1: And I think that’s what makes it hard for others to grasp. I don’t think most folk can imagine just carrying on with dislocated limbs... so they assume our pain just isn’t THAT bad when we carry on"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: also gentle side reminder that just because I’m standing
column5: doesn’t mean I should be ✨✨✨

column1: In or out of my chair
column2: I’m dealing with the same shit. Stop making assumptions based on how “fine” or “distressed” someone looks"

column4: it can be hard
column5: because at first glance
column6: both feet appear to be out-turned. But one of them is at least somewhat flat to the ground
column7: while the other is not even entirely in the shoe anymore lmao.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: but the differences can be spotted in the thickness of the ankle (the left is thicker as the bones spread over the foot)
column5: the skin (which is taut where the bones are pushing out)
column6: & the foot (which is higher in its socket & NOT flat to the ground)"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: while the right is in its “default” position.

column1: For myself
column2: the “default” state subluxed—My ankles can never be in their sockets.

column1: This can make it hard to know when somethings “wrong”"

column1: Another unexpected thing: extubation was pretty traumatic. I woke up suffocating and the nurses kept yelling at me like it was my fault? Idk if the fragile skin makes extubating a little rougher on us
column2: or maybe just got unlucky—but just a heads up."

column1: It’s TOO SHORT
I CANT EVEN SETTLE IN 💀💀💀🪦"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-30 16:34:46+00:00; ;1376935946189475844;en;99;0;3;2;Twitter for iPhone;"But if you tell a surgeon you have EDS and you really let them know how bad it is
column4: there’s a good chance they won’t even let you have surgery

column1: So even with all this knowledge
column2: it still feels like we’re kind of on our own"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: especially if wound healing & skin fragility is a big issue for you"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-30 16:32:25+00:00; ;1376935356839251969;en;71;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;I was so unprepared
column4: because people would bounce back from top surgery so quickly
column5: and I couldn’t even hold up my phone (the compression caused rib subluxations that went in for months—like
column6: more than my usual amount. It was hard to breathe)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-30 16:32:25+00:00; ;1376935355862155269;en;93;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And before you hop in—please
column4: I don’t mean “I had skin irritation and acne”

column1: I mean sizeable chunks of flesh would literally come off WITH THE ACE BANDAGE and bleed. It took well over 12 weeks for my wounds to close
column2: when top surgery is supposed to only be a 6 week recovery."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: .....I realize now it’s likely not a very common experience

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-20 15:10:16+00:00; ;1373290802256961545;en;256;0;2;10;Twitter for iPhone;"We were talking about scheduling & taking breaks (something I suck at)
column4: and I was trying to figure out how to know when I deserve to take a break. Like
column5: what if I just took a break yesterday?

column1: And yeah
column2: she dropped that wisdom and I was like “whoa hang on
column3: that just blew my mind”"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: I’d like to share some wisdom from my therapist that I think others may benefit from knowing:

column1: You deserve a break every day
column2: regardless of what you did the day before."

column4: Andrew

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-17 16:22:33+00:00; ;1372221831659274249;en;44;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"It feels like a lot of them don’t understand how you *can* still perpetuate ableism
column4: even when you have nothing but love and good intent. Accountability doesn’t mean “you’re evil and vile”—it means acknowledging impact & harm

column1: I think that’s where there’s some misunderstanding"

column1: However
column2: they already have *ample* space. I feel like accountability is a big issue here."
