column4: for me
column5: that’s a nuance thing.

column1: I do my best to save and work on activism related posts over several days
column2: to make them as accessible as possible.

column2: & I don’t have the capacity to do more. Idk.."

column1: Idk but that’s why I’m just posting my cat

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: exactly this. I don’t love that neurodivergence is shamed and framed as laziness when we struggle to perform a given task
column5: once again
column6: as if we don’t just have different access needs. And the comparisons to others

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: shun
column5: or condemn people (often from literally the only spaces that they have—like Twitter)
column6: solely because they cannot perform a task. All in the name of disability activism. It’s just... like it’s constant
column7: and idk how to even describe it.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column4: words are not my go-to form of communicating. It’s exhausting. Between that and executive dysfunction

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Taking the bus isn’t just unpleasant—it’s traumatic."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:03+00:00; ;1370804617307697153;en;239;0;1;5;Twitter for iPhone;"My childhood
column4: teenagehood
column5: and early adulthood was shaped by things cis boys & men will never experience. Things I can’t even begin to find the words to explain—it’s literally everywhere and it’s constant."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:03+00:00; ;1370804616447819784;en;212;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"If I excelled
column4: it was because “everyone lifts girls up now a days”—so I had to deal with bitter male teachers. And supervisors.

column1: If I was funny and landed a good joke
column2: it was because I was trying to be manipulative and “cute”."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:03+00:00; ;1370804615579582468;en;249;0;1;3;Twitter for iPhone;When I wanted to laugh
column4: or smile
column5: or NOT laugh or smile—when I wanted to be kind
column6: when I wanted to be neutral—literally everything was either coded as flirtatious
column7: or rude. Everything was shaped by the way men interpreted me
column8: and how I related to them relating to me.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:03+00:00; ;1370804614778531849;en;226;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;When I wanted to go out with friends. Or take a walk. Or come home alone. Or wear shorts.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:02+00:00; ;1370804613889282048;en;297;0;2;3;Twitter for iPhone;I was regularly reminded that I was not a boy. Idk if this is just a me thing
column4: but I was *regularly reminded* that I was a girl. Particularly when I took up too much space
column5: or failed to make myself as small and as quiet as possible. Or when I wore a shirt that was too tight.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-13 18:31:02+00:00; ;1370804612123521027;en;1140;11;15;138;Twitter for iPhone;"Hey just want to remind people that it’s okay to not identify with the “socialized x gender” narrative.

column1: For myself
column2: I don’t at all identify as having “always been a boy” because I wasn’t. I was a girl who longed to be a boy
column3: but was *bitterly* aware of the fact that I wasn’t."

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-11 16:22:45+00:00; ;1370047554310832131;en;48;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Why do I feel like such an inconvenience—even when I’m not doing anything?

column1: How is it that just *hearing* about disability is inconvenient (unless framed in a way that serves abled people)?
Who taught us this?
Where did I pick it up and where can I drop it off?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: I feel bad answering and I feel an overwhelming need to specify that “I’m not complaining
column5: it’s fine I’m just answering the question”

column1: And then I get mad that I feel the need to do that
column2: because why should I feel guilty for my reality? As if it’s my fault?"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: It is (and always will be) ableist.

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:23:54+00:00; ;1369700553702453257;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@audreyrsutton (...) moving forward
column4: so that they know that this happens

column1: It’s always okay to explain things! I’m just saying that explanations shouldn’t be stand-ins for apologies (but also you don’t need to apologize for being disabled)
Sorry I feel like I’m explaining this poorly"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:19:36+00:00; ;1369699470770896907;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@audreyrsutton Like
column4: I have leg and arm spasms that can cause me to accidentally hit people if they’re too close when it happens. I’ll apologize for hitting them
column5: but that’s not the same as apologizing for *having involuntary spasms*. In that scenario
column6: it makes sense to have a plan (...)

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:15:39+00:00; ;1369698476183928838;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@audreyrsutton I know sometimes people make us apologize for things like stimming—and I want to note that sometimes people expect us to apologize for simply *being* disabled
column4: and that has a lot more to do with ableism than it does personal accountability!

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:10:27+00:00; ;1369697167254974464;en;24;0;0;3;Twitter for iPhone;Stop prioritizing intent over impact in order to justify skipping over impact altogether. That’s not how this works.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:10:26+00:00; ;1369697166063702026;en;14;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"We understand what the behaviour is and the reason why it exists.

column1: That has nothing to do with taking accountability for it."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:03:07+00:00; ;1369695325234094082;en;20;0;2;3;Twitter for iPhone;"Accountability involves holding that space.

column1: Saying “here’s why I did it but why it’s not actually my fault
column2: and so actually you’re an asshole if you don’t forgive me” isn’t holding the space."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:00:37+00:00; ;1369694692540055555;en;20;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;Someone who’s not ready to hold themselves accountable for the *impact* of their actions is also not ready to actually improve themselves in a manner that supports those they’ve harmed.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 17:00:36+00:00; ;1369694691554365446;en;15;0;2;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Anyway
column4: there’s a difference between “here is the reason why I did that harmful thing I did”
column5: and actually *apologizing* for that harmful thing you did.

column1: Accountability seems to often get skimmed over
column2: and it really shouldn’t because it actually plays a huge role 🤷🏻‍♂️"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

And I’m not having it. So this is just a preemptive measure to avoid my words being misconstrued in the future ✨

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 16:52:00+00:00; ;1369692525603262464;en;24;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Side note—That doesn’t mean “harass people and call it accountability”

column1: For example: Reframing someone asserting their boundaries when you cross them as a personal attack on you—and using that to justify continued harassment under the guise of “holding them accountable”.
Don’t."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column2: but I don’t like the “like” button bc then it looks like I like things before I even know if I agree with them."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 04:07:06+00:00; ;1369500034262302721;en;111;0;2;27;Twitter Web App;"Disabled people don't owe you performance of disability.

column1: I'm disabled even when you aren't looking. Even when you can't see it. Even when it's inconvenient.
It's not performed or observed into existence"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 03:57:46+00:00; ;1369497682046226432;en;43;0;1;1;Twitter Web App;Why does something as arbitrary as taking pictures standing up (as if it even makes sense practically or accessibly to expect me to muscle my wheelchair into my cramped entrance way just to take a picture
column4: as opposed to just... waiting for a more convenient time) send people OFF?

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 03:57:45+00:00; ;1369497681056440321;en;47;0;1;3;Twitter Web App;"It's not a secret that I'm an ambulatory wheelchair user
column4: nor is it that my apartment is not as accessible as I need it to be (which means I sometimes must stand even when my bones are splitting apart).

column1: So why am I expected to *act* like it is?
Why am I expected to act at all?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 03:57:45+00:00; ;1369497680053944323;en;50;0;1;5;Twitter Web App;"I'm tired of having to explain this. I'm tired of having to justify *why* I exist as disabled in a way that isn't neat or easy or convenient to understand.

column1: I'm tired of having that existence challenged every time I refuse to perform my disability."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 03:24:48+00:00; ;1369489386816036869;en;115;0;1;22;Twitter Web App;"I need people to understand that:

column1: 1) I don't become less disabled when I stand or more disabled when I sit.
2)There is no disabled tooth fairy leaving accessible transport & housing under our pillows while we sleep."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
My leg is under pressure that could cause my bones to break or pull apart. Every step drives my foot further into the gap between my lower leg bones—
But I can walk.
And I can stand.
My access needs are often weighed on a scale where *that* is all that matters."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 03:24:47+00:00; ;1369489385008332808;en;59;1;1;12;Twitter Web App;"As disabled people
column4: our bodies are under constant scrutiny.

column1: We are expected to prove ourselves by performing our disabilities in a manner that meets ableist standards—where disability must either conform
There is no *room* for us in that."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: So why am I telling you this?"
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-10 00:22:52+00:00; ;1369443604427595779;en;59;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"TW: detailed description of injury
column4: dislocation

column1: If I didn’t have EDS
column2: I’d have broken a bone by now—but bc my connective tissues are basically mush
column3: the bones are just spreading “like a wishbone” (as my Dr described it).

column1: Which
column3: is not fun for my knee..."

column4: dislocation

column1: So this is a diagram of a dislocated ankle (you’ll notice it looks familiar!)
With my ankle out of place
column2: my foot is positioned between the leg bones—and standing/walking in it has caused my food to get wedged between them https://t.co/noEAiLVBBd"

column4: dislocation

column1: So I found out today that my left ankle is getting worse. In the following tweet I’ll show a diagram to better explain—but basically

column1: Here’s a quick test!

column2: & try to build yourself a remote schedule as a full-time student containing the classes needed to progress through that program.

column1: If you can’t do it
column2: then you don’t have a “hybrid model”."

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-03 15:05:28+00:00; ;1367129002561961987;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@thattubiekid I get that we all want to be taken seriously
column4: but pretending that I don’t experience what I am actually experiencing isn’t whats going to fix it. The problem is ableism and un-nuanced ideas about what disability is
column5: and how fluid it can be

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-03 15:04:04+00:00; ;1367128650563411976;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@thattubiekid Nah
column4: it’s legit not that common. Most folk with EDS have loose joints and subluxations—but full dislocations on the regular is not that common
column5: even for us.

column1: But there’s just this *obsession* with making sure “your symptoms aren’t worse than mine” like??????? Please. Why."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: just because something “isn’t rare” in your circle of Twitter
column5: doesn’t mean it isn’t actually rare in the world
column6: nor does it change the fact that most actual literal doctors/medical professionals look at us like “????????????” 99% of the time.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

column1: Stop."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans

I don’t know another person who has experiences full dislocations on a regular basis. I’ve had people get pissed because “not everyone’s EDS is like yours”—as if that’s what I’m ever trying to say...?

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 20:44:21+00:00; ;1361778464001585157;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AutisticAndCute Thank you so much ❤️.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:44:36+00:00; ;1361748328506150912;en;124;2;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I just can’t stop thinking about what this will mean for me and my prospects of finishing school once things are “back to normal”.

column1: And it makes me feel sick knowing that a pandemic is my best chance at graduating."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:41:13+00:00; ;1361747478568198148;en;86;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I need to spend as much time as possible being still so that these injuries can heal between appointments
column4: and to prevent them from getting worse or affecting other areas of my body (as they are now).

column1: I can hardly leave my house even once a month for medication."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:41:13+00:00; ;1361747477540597761;en;77;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;After weeks of more unrelenting leg pain
column4: I went back to the doctor yesterday to find out that my left ankle is out of place again. So much so that the offset has caused my knee to entirely come out
column5: which has offset my back and pelvis.

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:47+00:00; ;1361746112554668034;en;161;0;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;"I’ve found myself absolutely riddled with guilt over the fact that I feel a pang of panic every time people mention “things going back to normal”.

column1: Not just because I’m at higher risk for Covid—but because what is “normal” for you has never been equitable for me."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:47+00:00; ;1361746111569022977;en;190;2;1;46;Twitter for iPhone;"It is ableist to only offer remote access accommodations when it impacts able bodied students.

column1: It means that their access matters
Missing a year of class is acceptable for us
It’s not right."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:47+00:00; ;1361746110289698816;en;114;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"This year
column4: I find myself in that heightened state of pain almost daily. I know for a fact that if I were in school in person
column5: I would be forced to drop out.

column1: Not because I can’t do the work (I’m keeping up and maintaining my 4.0 GPA with 5 classes)—but because of ableism."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:47+00:00; ;1361746109358624774;en;98;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"The only reason why I didn’t need to drop out was because my prof and TA chose to allowed me to turn in my work
column4: of their own accord
column5: because they saw how hard I was working and they knew I was keeping up.

column1: We cut out the access centre."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:46+00:00; ;1361746107940880386;en;98;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"This was a class of like 500+ students in an auditorium with a huge projector and the teacher with the teacher lecturing over slides through a microphone. Remote access was possible.

column1: They refused. They wouldn’t even let me send my note taker to take notes for me in my absence."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:46+00:00; ;1361746107076923396;en;94;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"In the past
column4: I frequently couldn’t make it to my Friday classes in person. I had physical therapy on Thursdays
column5: and the pain would be so bad that I couldn’t get out of bed.

column1: The access center at my university told me I needed to drop the class."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-02-16 18:35:46+00:00; ;1361746105956982791;en;276;5;8;30;Twitter for iPhone;"I’ve been dealing with a lot of guilt lately. I’m wondering if other disabled students have felt the same.

column1: These last few months
column2: my dislocations have gotten worse due to muscle loss caused by a Gastroparesis flareup.

column1: I just know that there’s a lot of pressure to perform pain for the consumption of others in art
column2: & I wanted to remind folk that it’s okay to say no."

column1: Act like it."

column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-01-30 18:38:40+00:00; ;1355586244164661248;en;141;0;7;3;Twitter for iPhone;"I’m literally studying to *be an art teacher*

column1: I was *disappointed to learn that the person I was learning art history from myself was dead*
How is that controversial
column2: explain it to me. I didn’t mention tuition
column3: I didn’t say shit. I said it was sad. What exactly is the problem??"

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-01-30 18:32:47+00:00; ;1355584760731590663;en;99;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"Imagine being assigned a textbook and then literally never seeing your teacher ever
column4: not even once?

column1: Even then—at least you can’t confuse a textbook for a living person
column2: as one might during a pandemic when *all classes are online* and *the teachers tend to be alive*."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-01-30 18:32:46+00:00; ;1355584759863402496;en;100;1;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Lastly—it feels more than a little misleading for Concordia to reduce these videos to “learning tools
column4: like textbooks”

column1: That would imply having a living teacher who’s actively teaching us and merely referencing this material.
I have not seen or heard from the living professor."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column3: & Autistic ♿️;46818;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-01-30 18:32:46+00:00; ;1355584758995169284;en;100;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"I merely stated that it was a weird and sad experience. Because it was.

column1: I was excited to gossip about art with my prof and ask my nerdy detailed art history questions. Im really sad that I won’t get to. The students who got to learn from the living Dr Gagnon were very fortunate."
824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
column4: at which point exactly did I ask Concordia to take down these videos? Why are people acting like I did?

column1: I actually explicitly made a point about the importance of online accessible learning
column2: and why we shouldn’t vilify technology or online classes. This isn’t about that."

column1: 824989145491763200;AaronLinguini;Aaron “Access or Arson” Ansuini 💚🍋🪴🌱;🏳️‍🌈 Founder of non-profit Let’s Get By Together 🌱🏳️‍⚧️ Trans
